TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridTableStylesCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BaseCollection implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects in the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> contains <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects that allows the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control to display a customized grid style for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
On the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects. Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> displays each table using default settings for color, width, and formatting. All columns of each table are displayed. When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is added to the collection, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> to determine which object supplies the data for the grid. For example, if the data source is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> must match the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the objects. If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> does not match any of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> values, the default settings will be used to display data for each table, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> settings will be ignored.
> [!CAUTION] > Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>. When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you. Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>. Alternatively, clear the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection.Clear%2A> method.
## Examples The following code example creates two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adds each to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control.
[!code-cpp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CPP/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/CS/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GridTableStylesCollectionExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/GridTableStylesCollectionExamples/VB/gridtablestylescollectionexamples.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Examples The following code example creates two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects. The example then creates several <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and adds them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>. Finally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection.Add%2A> method.
